title: Riot Help please. Unable to play for three weeks now...
body:
"unable to connect to the login que"

I have received this error every day since the beginning of last patch.

I have tried

Several Reinstalls
Firewall settings
Router settings
DNS Flush
IP configuration release/renew
Several Repairs using Hextech tool

Riot???

replies.body:
That really sucks that you've been dealing with this for so long. Let's see if we can get you back on the Rift so that you can check out Kayn too!

I noticed you mentioned checking you router/firewall settings, but let's make sure you've gone through **all** of the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). After that, if nothing seems to be helping, let's also check for packet loss by grabbing something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and running a trace to our NA servers at 192.64.170.1.
